description_zh: 即刻是一个基于兴趣同好的交友社区，每时每刻都有好玩的人和有趣的事。 从今日热议到只有你关心的冷门兴趣，「即刻」什么都有，年轻人可以在不同兴趣圈子之间产生相遇和碰撞。
description_en: Jike is a dating community based on shared interests, with interesting people and events happening all the time. From today's hot topics to niche interests that only you care about, Jike has it all. Young people can encounter and interact with each other across different interest circles.
rating_zh: 国内氛围较好的社区，互联网浓度高，可发帖宣传自己的产品，容易收到转载收获种子用户。可以发在产品安利社、Chrome插件分享站、创业者的日常、AI探索站、独立开发的日常等圈子。
rating_en: There are domestic communities with a good atmosphere and a high concentration of internet users. You can post to promote your own products and easily get reposts to acquire early adopters. You can post in groups such as Product Recommendation Society, Chrome Extension Sharing Station, Entrepreneurs' Daily, AI Exploration Station, and Indie Development Daily.
